name: FrankenPHP Laravel Octane Buildpack
description: Heroku buildpack for Laravel Octane powered by FrankenPHP standalone binary (no Docker required).

FRANKENPHP_VERSION.description: FrankenPHP version to install (e.g. v1.4.0 or latest)

OCTANE_WORKERS.description: Number of Octane workers (auto = based on CPU cores)

OCTANE_MAX_REQUESTS.description: Max requests per worker before recycling
